VA CLD OBS AT 1720Z WI S1549 W07150 - S1607 W07149
- S1632 W07155 - S1622 W07210 - S1605 W07155 -
S1549 W07150 SFC/FL220
FCST AT 2330Z VA CLD WI S1522 W07146
- S1559 W07129 - S1622 W07129 - S1619 W07149 -
S1556 W07143 - S1540 W07143 - S1549 W07153 -
S1522 W07146 SFC/FL220==

WSUS32 KKCI 272055 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 35C 
VALID UNTIL 2255Z 
MO AR OK KS 
FROM 40SW BUM-40NE RZC-40ESE TUL-10NE TUL-40SW BUM 
AREA TS MOV FROM 25030KT. TOPS TO FL430. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 272255-280255 
AREA 1...FROM 40SW MCI-40ESE STL-MEM-50WSW TUL-40SW MCI 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40WNW GRB-30NW MBS-GIJ-40WNW DBQ-40WNW GRB 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 3...FROM 50SE CDS-50NW ACT-40SSE DLF-40NW DLF-80ESE MRF-80SE 
MRF-MRF-40SW INK-50SE CDS 
REF WW 149. 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
